definitions.definition: To stay where one cannot be seen, conceal oneself (often in a cowardly way or with the intent of doing harm ).
To move in a stealthy or furtive way; to come or go while trying to avoid detection .
To avoid an obligation or responsibility .

main_definition: To stay where one cannot be seen, conceal oneself (often in a cowardly way or with the intent of doing harm ).
secondary_definitions: To move in a stealthy or furtive way; to come or go while trying to avoid detection .
To avoid an obligation or responsibility .
